subject: Subject: Delivery Inquiry - Order #SSN4832
description_text:
It was stated in the latest update that the HS Pro shifter would be shipped
on December 29th. However, today is past the 29th, and my order status is
still showing as "Unfulfilled."

Could you please check the status of my shipment and provide the tracking
code immediately?

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10160 中
